about_the_game:
Game Overview

Trip Japan Puzzle is a screw-removal puzzle game set in Japan’s most famous locations! Solve puzzles while enjoying beautiful stage backgrounds featuring Tokyo, Kyoto, Osaka, Mount Fuji, and more.

Game Features

🛠 Simple Yet Deep Gameplay – Remove screws from wooden parts and rearrange them to clear each stage!
🗾 Feel Like You're Traveling in Japan – Visit iconic locations like Asakusa, Todaiji, Itsukushima Shrine, and Glover Garden while solving puzzles!
🎨 Stunning Visuals – Enjoy realistic backgrounds featuring actual photos, combined with the warm aesthetics of wooden puzzles.
🕹 Intuitive Controls – Easy to play with mouse or touch controls! Perfect for both beginners and puzzle enthusiasts.
⏳ Play at Your Own Pace – Gradually increasing difficulty ensures a satisfying and rewarding puzzle experience.

Explore Japan’s famous sites while enjoying a fun and brain-teasing puzzle adventure!
Can you solve all the challenges and clear every stage?
